TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPersistedSelector

Docs.summary: Provides a property that is used by the control to enable selecting data in a data-bound control through the query string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataKey ^ DataKey { System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataKey ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataKey ^ value); };
member this.DataKey : System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the data-key value for the selected record in a data-bound control.
Docs.value: The data-key value for the selected record in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPersistedSelector.DataKey%2A> property differs from the default selection made by the data-bound control because the item selected can be persisted across paging and the item may not be on the current page.
